name: The Game Of Horror Crash
description: The Game Of Horror Crash, We have finally released this game, we have been waiting for it since March 2020! We planned to release it in the summer of 2020 in June or July! And due to problems with the GameJolt site, the release of the game was delayed! But we finally released it! In this game you need to go through the location of the Hospital Dungeon №7, you need to shoot back from the Zombies! Also, after passing the entire location and defeating the Zombies, the game ends and you end the passage of our game! But be careful. Zombies are throwing their Shuriken!
